alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 30 at 12:06PM CDT until May 02 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Tyler Forks near Mellen affecting Ashland and Iron Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible on the Tyler Forks River. * WHERE...Tyler Forks near Mellen. * WHEN...Until Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.8 feet, At this level ST HWY 169 is likely impacted by flood water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...Water levels on the Tyler Forks River near Mellen may have crested earlier this morning, but additional rises may be possible this afternoon and evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Tyler Forks Mellen 9.0 8.4 Sat 5 pm CDT 7.5 7.1 6.8 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued this evening by 800 PM CDT.
